alert.note: Alert for Cochise (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued August 22 at 4:05PM MST until August 22 at 7:15PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Central Cochise County in southeastern Arizona... * Until 715 PM MST. * At 405 PM MST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated a strong thunderstorm producing very heavy rain near Dragoon. Flash flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Thunderstorms producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Radar and automated gauges. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Dragoon and Pearce-Sunsites. This includes the following highways... Route 191 between mile markers 55 and 58. This includes the following streams and drainages... Dragoon Wash and Walnut Wash. FLASH FLOOD...RADAR AND GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
